```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Transport belt group with belts from (-21.5, -47.5) to (-18.5, -47.5) and (-17.5, -46.5) to (-17.5, -51.5)
- Inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5) that puts items from belt to belt
- Inserter at position (-17.5, -46.5) that puts items from belt to belt
### Iron plate furnace at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Inserter at position (-16.5, -49.5) that puts items from belt to furnace
- Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5)
- Inserter at position (-12.5, -49.5) that puts items from furnace to chest

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when placing an entity next to another entity
- Ensure that there is enough space to place an entity next to another entity, check the spacing and direction
### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure that you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity

NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined.
Important variables:
- drill: BurnerMiningDrill(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 10}), name='burner-mining-drill', direction=Direction.DOWN, position=Position(x=-21.0, y=-50.0), energy=2666.6666666667, warnings=['output blocked by item on the ground. There is no sink entity in place to accept the output.'], status=EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION, neighbours=[Entity(name='transport-belt', direction=DOWN, position=Position(x=-19.5 y=-48.5)], drop_position=Position(x=-20.5, y=-48.5), resources=[Ingredient(name='iron-ore', count=39999, type=None)], height=2.0, width=2.0)
```
